wikitext.*:
'''Fastred''' ("Firm counsel") can refer to the following characters:

* [[Fastred (son of Folcwine)|Fastred]] (died {{TA|2885}}), son of [[Kings of Rohan|King]] [[Folcwine]] of [[Rohan]] who, with his twin-brother [[Folcred]], fell at the [[Crossings of Poros|Fords of Poros]].
* [[Fastred (rider of Rohan)|Fastred]] (died {{TA|3019}}), a knight of [[Théoden]]'s house who fell in the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields|Battle of Pelennor Fields]].  
* [[Fastred of Greenholm]] ([[Fourth Age]]), the first [[Warden of Westmarch]] and the husband of [[Elanor Gardner]],with whom he was ancestor of the [[Fairbairn Family|Fairbairns]].
{{disambig}}
